mapper.sql: id, dept_id, dept_name, company, num_emp_count, admin_user_id
mapper.select: select dept_name from dept where dept_id = #{deptId}
mapper.insert:
insert into dept
id,
dept_id,
dept_name,
company,
num_emp_count,
admin_user_id,

mapper.update:
update dept
dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num_emp_count = #{numEmpCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
admin_user_id = #{adminUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dept set dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num_emp_count = #{numEmpCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_user_id = #{adminUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
